Name: Kuggs
About the game: Kuggs is a fast-paced shooter with some light horror elements. Fight off hordes of enemies and grow stronger over 70 levels. Can you defeat all of the bosses? Features Fun Mechanics Unique Art Style ASMR -Choose one powerup (speed bonus, orb magnet, double ammo) -Choose one bullet type (fire, frost, poison) -Collect orbs to gain experience -Level 1-70 Controls : A - Left D - Right Space - boost upwards Hold left mouse to fire. R- return to main room P- restart game Esc - Exit *menu and updates coming soon* Made with Gamemaker Studio 2
Meta Title: Kuggs: Apr 22, 2022, Forrest Powell and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kuggs? Check out the release date (Apr 22, 2022), developer insights from Forrest Powell, and a complete game summary.
